Text: You did a great job as CEOJeff Just wanted to let you know that you did a great job as CEO I dont think Enron would be in position to have a goal of being the worlds leading company without you and all you have done for Enron I read you recently became engaged Congradulations Thats exciting news Maybe that played a role in your decision It will be great to have more time to spend with her I also read that the Teeside incident was the last straw That is good to know that we had such a sensitive and caring leader That will be missed Best wishes for you and your finance Ill be praying for you Greg Rye
